original_text:
It shall come to pass in the latter days
    that the mountain of the house of the Lord
shall be established as the highest of the mountains,
    and it shall be lifted up above the hills;
and peoples shall flow to it,
korean_text: 끝날에 이르러는 여호와의 전의 산이 산들의 꼭대기에 굳게 서며 작은 산들 위에 뛰어나고 민족들이 그리로 몰려갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: It shall come to pass in the latter days
that the mountain of the house of the Lord
shall be established as the highest of the mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 여러 산 중에서 가장 높은 산으로 세워질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and it shall be lifted up above the hills
and peoples shall flow to it
